body:
Whilst our prediction model is being built, we're going to share the best Rocket Mortgage Classic Picks. 

We've gone through our favorite betting providers (bettors that actually win), and searched for common selections.

These tips come from:

* **[Golf Prediction Model](https://www.betfair.com.au/hub/golf-prediction-model/)** from Betfair Australia
* **[Steve Rawlings](https://betting.betfair.com/golf/the-punter/rocket-mortgage-classic-2020-betting-preview-290620-167.html)** from Betfair UK
* **[Data Golf](https://datagolf.com/)**
* **[Dave Tindall](https://betting.betfair.com/golf/golf-bets/rocket-mortgage-classic-betting-tips-lift-off-with-stallings-300620-719.html)** from Betfair UK

- - -

## **2020 Rocket Mortgage Classic Picks**

With that in mind, we're going with **Hideki Matsuyama (+1800 BetMGM)** as our primary pick.

The Japanese superstar pops up as the number one pick on the Prediction Model and Data Golf.

Then the Betfair boys are aligned on **Kevin Na (+3800 FanDuel)** 

Lastly **Sebastian Mu√±oz (+15000 FanDuel)** pops up on two providers.
